attributes.action: Would like to add British punjabi as column to ethnicity .
attributes.additional_details: India consider Sikhs as terrorist,  we do not want to want to be associated with form stating we are Indians if Sikh identify is crushed in India.  I rather be known as a British punjab. Then Indian.
attributes.background: As the treatment of Sikhs in India, and in the past , I would like Sikhs to be stabilised at punjab British from British Indian.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563651
